title: Combine Katalon Studio with SAP Scripting Tracker for Windows
description: Scripting Tracker is a utility and a replacement to the SAP GUI Scripting Development Tools. It is an SAP GUI analyzer and recorder on the SAP GUI Scripting base. You can learn more about SAP Scripting Tracker in the SAP blog post here: Scripting Tracker â€“ Development Tool for SAP GUI Scripting.
